compatibility.notes: TMate license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without imposing restrictions.

key_requirements: Redistributions must retain the copyright notice.
Redistributions must include a copy of the license.
Source code must be disclosed or made available under reasonable conditions.
license.name: TMate
obligations: Retain copyright notice in redistributions of source code.
Include copyright notice and disclaimer in redistributions of binary form.
Provide information on how to obtain complete source code for the software that uses SVNKit.
Obtain explicit permission from TMate Software for redistribution without source code.
